== Anandapuram (627894) ==

Anandapuram is a village in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 610 hectares and harbouring 1733 households with total population of 6741 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Irinjalakuda]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 3204 and female population is 3537. Scheduled Caste Population is 1010 and Scheduled Tribes population is 22. Census Location Code of the village is 627894<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
